content:
A question from the field and a quick look at some resources made me realize that there are many differences in how different resources model the same thing.
For example for "reporter" we have (IIRC)

  • reporter
  • recorder
  • informationSource
  • a keyed value in a few other resources, where "reporter/recorder" could be one of the values, but that is not clear.

without making things model-centric, shouldn't this be reviewed for impact?
This may affect e.g. search (same problem as we have for products)

We have an open Jira issue about defining search parameters for our patterns. We have an open question to @Grahame Grieve about what sort of fits defining a SearchParameter against a logical model would cause the tooling.
